metadata.title: Mohammad Ali Portfolio
metadata.description: Portfolio for showcasing projects and skills.

hero.name: Mohammad Ali
hero.description: I enjoy coding and creating things that make a difference

description: I am an experienced developer with a passion for creating innovative and impactful applications. I specialize in React, React Native, and Node.js, with a focus on delivering user-friendly and high-performing solutions.
In addition to development, I enjoy exploring new technologies, solving challenging problems, and mentoring others.

projects.title: Blackjack Game Application
projects.description: Developed a cross-platform Blackjack game using React Native and Expo. Integrated real-time gameplay with WebSocket and provided a seamless user experience.

projects.title: Gonbad Kabud - Kids' Interactive Learning App
projects.description: An interactive learning and storybook app for children. Features animations, story-driven activities, and parental controls for a secure and educational experience.

projects.title: Rekasb Website and Plugin Development
projects.description: Developed a professional website and WordPress plugin for seamless integration with React applications. The project aimed to streamline the user experience and enhance accessibility.

projects.title: Freelancer Web Bot
projects.description: Developed an automated web bot to assist freelancers in managing tasks efficiently. Features include task scheduling, data scraping, and seamless integrations with freelancing platforms.

projects.title: Charsoq - Maris Application Development
projects.description: Enhanced and maintained the Maris application for a data-driven marketing agency. Focused on UI/UX improvements, feature updates, and library compatibility.

projects.title: KTT Company Website
projects.description: Developed a responsive and modern website for Tolou Taban Company (KTT), established in 2008. The site highlights the company’s expertise in infrastructure projects, industrial kitchen consulting, and human resource solutions. Focused on delivering a user-friendly experience to showcase their diverse services, including construction, waste management, and restaurant operations.

projects.title: Pezeshket - Health Consultation App
projects.description: Contributed to the development of a telehealth platform enabling users to access medical consultations and services. Delivered a responsive and user-friendly interface.

contact.callToAction: Reach out for exciting collaborations or opportunities!
